channel.title: Stuck in cage in the Ichthyosaur pool (Apprehension)
channel.description:
Here is a screenshot of it:
You also retain the ability to shoot weapons that are normally not working underwater so it seems if you get stuck this way the game doesn't enable the underwater mode. [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=439561256[/url]

item.title: Stuck in cage in the Ichthyosaur pool (Apprehension)
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
Same thing happened to me except it was stuck in midair.

Read full topic
item.source: Stuck in cage in the Ichthyosaur pool (Apprehension)

item.title: Stuck in cage in the Ichthyosaur pool (Apprehension)
item.dc:creator: Strider397
item.description:
yep, same here. Also I had the ability to keep breathing at the same time.

While Apprehension is being mentioned, I just wanted to point out that the levels title didn’t appear at the start.

Read full topic
item.source: Stuck in cage in the Ichthyosaur pool (Apprehension)
